docs.title: ISO-TP C Implementation
docs.text: ISO-TP (ISO 15765-2) protocol implementation in C.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Full ISO-TP protocol support
  • Configurable parameters
  • Minimal dependencies

docs.title: Building
docs.text:
cmake -B build
cmake --build build

docs.title: Integration
docs.text:
Include the header file: 

#include "isotp.h"

docs.title: API Reference
docs.text: The API reference is automatically generated from the source code using Doxygen.

docs.title: Main Components
docs.text:
• isotp.h - Main protocol header
  • isotp_config.h - Configuration options
  • isotp_user.h - User callback definitions
  • isotp_defines.h - Protocol definitions

docs.title: Functions
docs.text: Detailed function documentation is available in the generated API documentation.

docs.title: Data Structures
docs.text:
Core data structures for ISO-TP protocol handling are documented in the API reference.

For more information, please refer to the ISO 15765-2 standard.

docs.title: isotp_config.h
docs.text: The isotp_config.h file contains compile-time configuration options.

docs.title: Key Configuration Options
docs.text:
• ISOTP_MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH - Maximum message length
  • ISOTP_TIMEOUT - Communication timeout
  • ISOTP_PADDING_ENABLED - Enable/disable frame padding

docs.title: User Callbacks
docs.text: Configure user-defined callbacks in isotp_user.h for: - Frame transmission - Frame reception - Timing management

docs.title: More Information
docs.text: See inc/isotp_config.h for detailed configuration parameters.

docs.title: Initialization
docs.text:
Initialize the ISO-TP protocol handler:

isotp_t handler;
// Initialize with appropriate parameters

docs.title: Sending Data
docs.text:
Transmit ISO-TP messages:

uint8_t data[] = {/* your data */};
// Use isotp send functions

docs.title: Receiving Data
docs.text:
Handle incoming ISO-TP frames:

// Use isotp receive functions

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text: See Configuration Guide for detailed configuration options.

docs.title: Error Handling
docs.text:
The library provides error codes for various conditions: - Timeout errors - Protocol errors - Frame validation errors

For details, refer to the API Reference.
